20  package org.elasticsearch.index.cache.filter.weighted;
21  
22  import com.google.common.cache.Cache;
23  import com.google.common.cache.RemovalListener;
24  import com.google.common.cache.Weigher;
25  
26  import org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader;
27  import org.apache.lucene.index.LeafReaderContext;
28  import org.apache.lucene.index.SegmentReader;
29  import org.apache.lucene.search.BitsFilteredDocIdSet;
30  import org.apache.lucene.search.DocIdSet;
31  import org.apache.lucene.search.Filter;
32  import org.apache.lucene.search.FilterCachingPolicy;
33  import org.apache.lucene.util.Bits;
34  import org.elasticsearch.ElasticsearchException;
35  import org.elasticsearch.common.Nullable;
36  import org.elasticsearch.common.inject.Inject;
37  import org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.HashedBytesRef;
38  import org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.docset.DocIdSets;
39  import org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.search.CachedFilter;
40  import org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.search.NoCacheFilter;
41  import org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.search.ResolvableFilter;
42  import org.elasticsearch.common.settings.Settings;
43  import org.elasticsearch.common.util.concurrent.ConcurrentCollections;
44  import org.elasticsearch.index.AbstractIndexComponent;
45  import org.elasticsearch.index.Index;
46  import org.elasticsearch.index.IndexService;
47  import org.elasticsearch.index.cache.filter.FilterCache;
48  import org.elasticsearch.index.settings.IndexSettings;
49  import org.elasticsearch.index.shard.IndexShard;
50  import org.elasticsearch.index.shard.ShardId;
51  import org.elasticsearch.index.shard.ShardUtils;
52  import org.elasticsearch.indices.cache.filter.IndicesFilterCache;
53  
54  import java.io.IOException;
55  import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap;
56  
57  public class WeightedFilterCache extends AbstractIndexComponent implements FilterCache, SegmentReader.CoreClosedListener, IndexReader.ReaderClosedListener {
58  
59      final IndicesFilterCache indicesFilterCache;
60      IndexService indexService;
61  
62      final ConcurrentMap<Object, Boolean> seenReaders = ConcurrentCollections.newConcurrentMap();
63  
64      @Inject
65      public WeightedFilterCache(Index index, @IndexSettings Settings indexSettings, IndicesFilterCache indicesFilterCache) {
66          super(index, indexSettings);
67          this.indicesFilterCache = indicesFilterCache;
68      }
69  
70      @Override
71      public void setIndexService(IndexService indexService) {
72          this.indexService = indexService;
73      }
74  
75      @Override
76      public String type() {
77          return "weighted";
78      }
79  
80      @Override
81      public void close() throws ElasticsearchException {
82          clear("close");
83      }
84  
85      @Override
86      public void onClose(IndexReader reader) {
87          clear(reader.getCoreCacheKey());
88      }
89  
90  
91      @Override
92      public void clear(String reason) {
93          logger.debug("full cache clear, reason [{}]", reason);
94          for (Object readerKey : seenReaders.keySet()) {
95              Boolean removed = seenReaders.remove(readerKey);
96              if (removed == null) {
97                  return;
98              }
99              indicesFilterCache.addReaderKeyToClean(readerKey);
100         }
101     }
102 
103     @Override
104     public void clear(String reason, String[] keys) {
105         logger.debug("clear keys [], reason [{}]", reason, keys);
106         for (String key : keys) {
107             final HashedBytesRef keyBytes = new HashedBytesRef(key);
108             for (Object readerKey : seenReaders.keySet()) {
109                 indicesFilterCache.cache().invalidate(new FilterCacheKey(readerKey, keyBytes));
110             }
111         }
112     }
113 
114     @Override
115     public void onClose(Object coreKey) {
116         clear(coreKey);
117     }
118 
119     @Override
120     public void clear(Object coreCacheKey) {
121         // we add the seen reader before we add the first cache entry for this reader
122         // so, if we don't see it here, its won't be in the cache
123         Boolean removed = seenReaders.remove(coreCacheKey);
124         if (removed == null) {
125             return;
126         }
127         indicesFilterCache.addReaderKeyToClean(coreCacheKey);
128     }
129 
130     @Override
131     public Filter cache(Filter filterToCache, @Nullable HashedBytesRef cacheKey, FilterCachingPolicy cachePolicy) {
132         if (filterToCache == null) {
133             return null;
134         }
135         if (filterToCache instanceof NoCacheFilter) {
136             return filterToCache;
137         }
138         if (CachedFilter.isCached(filterToCache)) {
139             return filterToCache;
140         }
141         if (filterToCache instanceof ResolvableFilter) {
142             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot cache instances of ResolvableFilter: " + filterToCache);
143         }
144         return new FilterCacheFilterWrapper(filterToCache, cacheKey, cachePolicy, this);
145     }
146 
147     static class FilterCacheFilterWrapper extends CachedFilter {
148 
149         private final Filter filter;
150         private final Object filterCacheKey;
151         private final FilterCachingPolicy cachePolicy;
152         private final WeightedFilterCache cache;
153 
154         FilterCacheFilterWrapper(Filter filter, Object cacheKey, FilterCachingPolicy cachePolicy, WeightedFilterCache cache) {
155             this.filter = filter;
156             this.filterCacheKey = cacheKey != null ? cacheKey : filter;
157             this.cachePolicy = cachePolicy;
158             this.cache = cache;
159         }
160 
161         @Override
162         public DocIdSet getDocIdSet(LeafReaderContext context, Bits acceptDocs) throws IOException {
163             if (context.ord == 0) {
164                 cachePolicy.onUse(filter);
165             }
166             FilterCacheKey cacheKey = new FilterCacheKey(context.reader().getCoreCacheKey(), filterCacheKey);
167             Cache<FilterCacheKey, DocIdSet> innerCache = cache.indicesFilterCache.cache();
168 
169             DocIdSet cacheValue = innerCache.getIfPresent(cacheKey);
170             final DocIdSet ret;
171             if (cacheValue != null) {
172                 ret = cacheValue;
173             } else {
174                 final DocIdSet uncached = filter.getDocIdSet(context, null);
175                 if (cachePolicy.shouldCache(filter, context, uncached)) {
176                     if (!cache.seenReaders.containsKey(context.reader().getCoreCacheKey())) {
177                         Boolean previous = cache.seenReaders.putIfAbsent(context.reader().getCoreCacheKey(), Boolean.TRUE);
178                         if (previous == null) {
179                             // we add a core closed listener only, for non core IndexReaders we rely on clear being called (percolator for example)
180                             context.reader().addCoreClosedListener(cache);
181                         }
182                     }
183                     // we can't pass down acceptedDocs provided, because we are caching the result, and acceptedDocs
184                     // might be specific to a query. We don't pass the live docs either because a cache built for a specific
185                     // generation of a segment might be reused by an older generation which has fewer deleted documents
186                     cacheValue = DocIdSets.toCacheable(context.reader(), uncached);
187                     // we might put the same one concurrently, that's fine, it will be replaced and the removal
188                     // will be called
189                     ShardId shardId = ShardUtils.extractShardId(context.reader());
190                     if (shardId != null) {
191                         IndexShard shard = cache.indexService.shard(shardId.id());
192                         if (shard != null) {
193                             cacheKey.removalListener = shard.filterCache();
194                             shard.filterCache().onCached(DocIdSets.sizeInBytes(cacheValue));
195                         }
196                     }
197                     innerCache.put(cacheKey, cacheValue);
198                     ret = cacheValue;
199                 } else {
200                     // uncached
201                     ret = uncached;
202                 }
203             }
204 
205             return BitsFilteredDocIdSet.wrap(DocIdSets.isEmpty(ret) ? null : ret, acceptDocs);
206         }
207 
208         @Override
209         public String toString(String field) {
210             return "cache(" + filter + ")";
211         }
212 
213         @Override
214         public boolean equals(Object o) {
215             if (!(o instanceof FilterCacheFilterWrapper)) return false;
216             return this.filter.equals(((FilterCacheFilterWrapper) o).filter);
217         }
218 
219         @Override
220         public int hashCode() {
221             return filter.hashCode() ^ 0x1117BF25;
222         }
223     }
224 
225 
226     /** A weigher for the Guava filter cache that uses a minimum entry size */
227     public static class FilterCacheValueWeigher implements Weigher<WeightedFilterCache.FilterCacheKey, DocIdSet> {
228 
229         private final int minimumEntrySize;
230 
231         public FilterCacheValueWeigher(int minimumEntrySize) {
232             this.minimumEntrySize = minimumEntrySize;
233         }
234 
235         @Override
236         public int weigh(FilterCacheKey key, DocIdSet value) {
237             int weight = (int) Math.min(DocIdSets.sizeInBytes(value), Integer.MAX_VALUE);
238             return Math.max(weight, this.minimumEntrySize);
239         }
240     }
241 
242     public static class FilterCacheKey {
243         private final Object readerKey;
244         private final Object filterKey;
245 
246         // if we know, we will try and set the removal listener (for statistics)
247         // its ok that its not volatile because we make sure we only set it when the object is created before its shared between threads
248         @Nullable
249         public RemovalListener<WeightedFilterCache.FilterCacheKey, DocIdSet> removalListener;
250 
251         public FilterCacheKey(Object readerKey, Object filterKey) {
252             this.readerKey = readerKey;
253             this.filterKey = filterKey;
254         }
255 
256         public Object readerKey() {
257             return readerKey;
258         }
259 
260         public Object filterKey() {
261             return filterKey;
262         }
263 
264         @Override
265         public boolean equals(Object o) {
266             if (this == o) return true;
267 //            if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
268             FilterCacheKey that = (FilterCacheKey) o;
269             return (readerKey().equals(that.readerKey()) && filterKey.equals(that.filterKey));
270         }
271 
272         @Override
273         public int hashCode() {
274             return readerKey().hashCode() + 31 * filterKey.hashCode();
275         }
276     }
277 }
